item.title: I need help turn master and pure offf
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

make it so player rights must be 2 or more, if you don’t know how to do that look at one of your other staff commands (eg ban or mute) and look at the bit about player rights

edit: didnt see above post when i posted,

this is better:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } }

Read full topic

item.title: I need help turn master and pure offf
item.dc:creator: @timmarus1 timmarus1
item.description:
@timmarus1 wrote:

I’m gonna spoon-feed this kid, 'cus I don’t have anything else to do lol.

 if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights == 3)
         {
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 0);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 1);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 2);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 3);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 4);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 5);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 6);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 7);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 8);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 9);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 10);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 11);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 12);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 13);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 14);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 15);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 16);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 17);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 18);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 19);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 20);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 21);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 22);
   addSkillXP(1491000000, 23);
   sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you've successfuly cheated... noob.");
  }

If you wanna make it for owner only.
